buoyant.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Phil was in a buoyant mood.
buoyant.translation[0].definitions[1].de: buoyant prices etc tend to rise
buoyant.translation[0].definitions[2].de: able to float or keep things floating
buoyant.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a buoyant market, economy etc is successful and has a lot of trading activity, and prices are rising rather than falling
buoyant.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: There is also a buoyant market for expensive Swiss watches.
Sterling lost ground against a buoyant yen.
